attributes.action: If people are paying for sky or cable then we should not have to pay for licence
attributes.additional_details: U need a tv listens Becouse BBC don't have adverts and for the satellite signal.. if u don't watch BBC why should u pay and if you have sky or cable then they have to pay for the signal so they get money twice for u watching telly it's wrong it needs to stop
attributes.background: why pay twice for the same thing you pay sky. Sky have to pay for them to use there signal for you to watch there tv but yet you still have to pay for a licence to watch

rejection.details: If you'd like the TV Licence fee to be abolished, you could start a new petition asking for that.
